structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Administrative Office of the Courts to send notices of felony convictions to the State Board of Elections.
law.text: The Administrative Office of the Courts shall send certified notices of conviction of a felony to the State Board of Elections within ten (10) days after the conviction becomes final, including the exhaustion of all appeals, with regard to any person before the courts of the Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 341, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988.
